attributes.action: David Moyes for a Knighthood for services to football
attributes.additional_details: David Moyes has contributed his great managerial skills from the depths of Preston via Everton, to the biggest challenge of them all. Manchester United. He deserves to be honoured for his services to football and Manchester United in particular. He as single handedly, and without influence managed to create a team that plays for 90 minutes with the alloted injury time, and graciously accepts defeat when they lose. He is honest and deserves a Knighthood.
